"{" + "\"Attribute\":\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Type__c) + "\"," + "\"KeyField\":\"Type__c\"," + "\"SelectFields\":\"Id, Type__c,MCOL__c,MCHRNG__c,MCAR__c,MCOG__c,MCOR__c,MCDP__c,MCDD__c,MCGD__c,MCTSOR__c,MCGR1__c,MCGR2__c,MCSS1__c,MCSS2__c,MCSS3__c,MCIL__c,MCIR1__c,MCIC1__c,MCIC2__c,MCIR3__c,MCIR2__c,MCHI__c,MCHO__c,MCHS__c,MCVS1__c,MCVS2__c,MCVS3__c,MCIG__c,MCHT__c,MCOC__c,MCDT1__c,MCDT2__c,Inlet_Option_Code__c,Outlet_Option_Code__c,ASME_Inlet_Option_Code__c,ASME_Outlet_Option_Code__c\"," + "\"DetailObject\":\"RD_Component_MB_Detail__c\"," + "\"Criteria\":\"" +
cdcpc__Filter_Text1__c + cdcpc__Filter_Text2__c + cdcpc__Filter_Text3__c + cdcpc__Filter_Text4__c + cdcpc__Filter_Text5__c + cdcpc__Filter_Num1__c + cdcpc__Filter_Num2__c +
"\"," + "\"DependentAttributes\": [" +
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Text1__c)), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Text1__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Text2__c)), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Text2__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Text3__c)), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Text3__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Text4__c)), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Text4__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Text5__c)), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Text5__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Num1__c )), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Num1__c) + "\", ", "") + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(cdcpc__Num2__c )), "\"" + LOWER(cdcpc__Num2__c) + "\", ", "") +

CustomField.label: Detail Query Dependencies
